id.description: Unique identifier for the Category entity.

description.description: A short description of the category.

Product.title: Product
Product.description: Represents a product within a category.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Product entity.

categoryId.description: ID of the category this product belongs to.

imageHint.description: Hint for AI to find a better image.

GradedRank.title: GradedRank
GradedRank.description: Represents a graded ranking of a product.

id.description: Unique identifier for the GradedRank entity.

productId.description: ID of the product being ranked.

categoryId.description: ID of the category the product belongs to.

rank.description: The grade given to the product.

ComparativeRank.title: ComparativeRank
ComparativeRank.description: Represents a comparative ranking between two products.

id.description: Unique identifier for the ComparativeRank entity.

categoryId.description: ID of the category the products belong to.

/products/{productId}.description: Stores all products, queryable by categoryId.

/gradedRankings/{rankingId}.description: Stores all graded rankings, queryable by categoryId or productId.

/comparativeRankings/{rankingId}.description: Stores all comparative rankings, queryable by categoryId.
